One of the beautiful things Sh Muhammad alBanna rahimahullah said to me is "inshaaAllah we will meet in Jannah and we will remember the good there."

In 1995 he was the best we had in Jeddah.
He was teaching Tafseer ibn Katheer, Mukhtasar Saheeh Muslim and Umdatul Ahkaam.

[الذّاكرُ لله تعالى في سائرِ البِقاع يكثُر شُهودُه] 
عدّدَ الإمامُ ابنُ القيّم فوائدَ ذِكر الله تعالى،منها:"الحاديةُ والسّبعون:
أنّ في دَوامِ الذِّكْرِ في الطّريقِ والبيتِ والحضَرِ والسّفرِوالبِقَاعِ؛تكثيرَ الشُّهودِ للعبدِ يومَ القِيامة؛فإنّ البُقعةَ والدّارَ والجَبلَ والأرضَ تَشْهدُ للذَّاكِرِ يومَ القِيامةِ...والذّاكِرُ لله عزّوجلّ
 في سائرِالبِقاعِ يَكْثُرُ شُهُودُه،ولعلَّهم أو أكثرهم أنْ يُقبَلوا يومَ قِيامِ الأشهادِ،وأداءِ الشّهاداتِ؛فيَفرحُ ويَغتبِطُ بشهادتِهم"
(الوابل الصَّيّب)(١٩٧-١٩٨)

قال الشَّوكاني - رحمه الله -:
مَن أراد الاستكثار مِن فضل الله مِن 
الحسنات؛ فليقل:
*(اللَّهمَّ اغفر للمؤمنين والمؤمنات)*
*فإنَّه يُكتب له مِن الحسنات؛*
*ما لا يحيط به حصرٌ ولا يتصوَّره فكرٌ*
*وفضل الله واسعٌ.*
  تحفة الذَّاكرين (384) ]

Every day is a day closer to our reckoning and accountability.

Take what Allah has given you with strength. The stronger you are, the weaker shaytan is against you. 
Remember Allah much. Be sincere and seek the pleasure of Allah by following the Sunnah. With that is salvation.

Jesus Christ, the son of Maryam (peace be upon them) never said he was God or son of God. He wasn't born on the 25th December. His mother was eating ripe dates when she gave birth to him. The 25th of December was chosen because the pagans were worshipping the sun on that day.

https://t.co/EbBrJVQd2O

Lesson Five

A Glimpse into The Lives of The Four Rightly Guided Khulafā.

A glimpse into the life of the Fourth Khaleef- 'Alī ibn Abee Taalib (may Allāh be pleased with him).

By Shaykh 'Abdulilah Lahmami @Abdulilah_UK (may Allāh protect him).

• His full name.
• He was the first of the young to become Muslim.
• His kunya was Abul Hasan, he was also called Abu Turāb by the prophet (peace and blessings of Allāh be upon him).
• His mum used to call him as a nickname- Haydara which means lion.
• He had 14 sons and 18 daughters.
• Hasan and Hussayn (may Allāh be pleased with them) are the most well-known of his children. 
• 'Ali was known for his bravery. 
• 'Umar selected 'Alī to be one of the six Shurā (committee) members to decide who would be the next Khaleef after he passes away.
• 'Alī aided all the Khulafā during their reigns.
• 'Alī was from the best of judges.
• 'Alī was from those who prayed towards the two Qiblahs (prayer directions).
• He made Hijrah to Madeenah. 
• He partook in the battle of Al-Badr.
• He was from the ten who were promised Paradise by name.
• He was was from those who gave the pledge Under the Tree.
• Some of his many virtues.
• His implementation of the Sunnah of the prophet (peace and blessings of Allāh be upon him) even in the subtle issues.

Full Playlist (Five Lessons).

Jumu'ah Khutbah 26/12/2025

The prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم: A Mercy That Purifies.

By Shaykh 'Abdulilah Lahmami @Abdulilah_UK (may Allāh protect him).

• The prophet (peace and blessings of Allāh be upon him) came to purify us, what does that mean? 
• Our prophet (peace and blessings of Allāh be upon) came to take us away from every lowly and evil manners and characteristics, and guided us to every noble and lofty manners and characteristics.
• Use your free time to visit family and relatives. Maintain the ties of kinship. 
• Don't search for the faults of others.
• Striving to have that secret good deed that no one knows about.
• The righteous used to fear showing-off, but nowadays so many people displaying their acts of worship on social media!
• The emotional and powerful words our mother 'A'aishah (may Allāh be pleased with her) said on her deathbed. 
• Always have righteous and sincere intentions and you will be rewarded much.

“I guarantee a house in paradise for one who gives up arguing, even if he is in the right”. — Sahih Abu Dawud 4800

Siddeeq Hasan Khan rahimahullah said:

Truth is known from whomsoever has gathered five attributes, the greatest of them is sincerity, understanding, justice, striving to know the truth and striving much to call to it.

 (Qatfu Thamr fi Bayaan 'Aqeedati Ahlil Athar p.175)

The Prophet sallallaahu alaihi wasallam: "Whoever humbles himself then Allah raises him"
The opposite is also true
